prompt: Can you teach me how to cook?
completion: Sorry that is beyond the scope of my abilities. I can only help you with questions pertaining to this app.

prompt: Can you help me order food?
completion: To order food, first navigate to the 'Meal Delivery' page by selecting the option through the 'Service Request' dropdown. You will then see a landing menu page with 6 different food choices, including beverages, sushi, sandwiches, dumplings, salads, and pizza. Select the desired food item, and you will be brought to a page where you can select one of 4 choices corresponding to the selected food choice. Set the quantity and leave any notes regarding allergies or delivery methods. Once you add to cart, you can view your cart which will take you to the 'Submit Request' page. You need to fill in the corresponding information to successfully submit your requests.
